name: Amazon Jungle Monkey Gold Hunting-A Joy Ride Fun
name_original: Amazon Jungle Monkey Gold Hunting-A Joy Ride Fun
description:
Jump, Fly, Tap and Bounce your way through the Kingdom Realms with our Hero. The bumbling King has mislaid all the Royal coins and you must help Prince collect them all on his biggest adventure yet!

Introducing our happy Hero and heir to the throne, the most awesome and cheeky Prince Charming the realms have ever seen. Travel with him through the magical kingdom collecting all the treasury gold along the way. Jump crazy spinning wheels, fire from cannons and find the magic cloaks that will speed you on your way. Use your skills to guide the Prince and help him complete each stage and win him all 10 achievements….have fun!

Great Features:

- One Tap addictive game play
- 25 unique fun filled levels
- Travel through 5 spectacular Castle Realms
- Endless Run Mode. How far through the Kingdom you can go?
- Magic Cloaks, Golden Chests and Coins to help your quest
- Game Center Achievement Leaderboard
